mapper.select:
WITH OG_PRTNR_WARE_INF AS ( /* 조직 및 창고 */ SELECT O1.BASE_YM , O1.OG_ID , O1.OG_TP_CD , O1.OG_CD , O1.OG_NM , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W06') THEN '71314' ELSE O1.OG_ID END) AS L1_HGR_OG_ID , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID ELSE O1.OG_ID END) AS L2_HGR_OG_ID , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID ELSE O1.OG_ID END) AS L3_HGR_OG_ID , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W06') THEN '71314' ELSE O1.OG_CD END) AS L1_HGR_OG_CD , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD ELSE O1.OG_CD END) AS L2_HGR_OG_CD , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD ELSE O1.OG_CD END) AS L3_HGR_OG_CD , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W06') THEN 'Wells CS운영팀' ELSE O1.OG_NM END) AS L1_HGR_OG_NM , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM ELSE O1.OG_NM END) AS L2_HGR_OG_NM , (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR3_LEVL_OG_NM ELSE O1.OG_NM END) AS L3_HGR_OG_NM , O1.HGR_OG_ID , S1.WARE_NO , S1.WARE_NM , S1.WARE_USE_YN , S1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO , S1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD , S1.HGR_WARE_NO , S1.STD_WARE_USE_YN /*표준창고사용여부*/ , O2.PRTNR_NO , O2.PRTNR_KNM , O2.FST_CNTR_DT /*최초계약일자*/ , O2.FNL_CLTN_DT /*최종해약일자*/ , O2.RCNTR_DT /*재계약일자*/ , O2.CLTN_DT /*해약일자*/ , O2.CNTR_DT /*계약일자*/ , O2.HIR_FOM_CD /*고용형태코드,1 사업자, 2 계약직,3 정규직, 4 법인영업수수료대상 , 5 강사, 9 기타(위탁)*/ , O2.BZ_STAT_CD /*사업상태코드, 1 사업, 2 해약, 3 휴업*/ , O2.PSTN_DV_CD /*직급구분코드*/ , O2.RSB_DV_CD /*직책구분코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RSB_DV_CD', O2.RSB_DV_CD, 'ko') AS RSB_DV_CD_NM , O2.ROL_DV_CD /*직무구분코드*/ , O2.PRTNR_GD_CD /*파트너등급코드*/ , O2.QLF_DV_CD /*자격구분코드*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'QLF_DV_CD', O2.QLF_DV_CD, 'ko') AS QLF_DV_NM , O2.PERF_EXCD_OJ_YN /*실적제외대상여부*/ , O2.RDS_DSB_EXCD_OJ_YN /*RDS지급제외대상여부*/ , O3.PRTNR_GD_CD AS ENG_PRTNR_GD_CD /*파트너등급코드*/ , COUNT(1) OVER (PARTITION BY HGR_OG_ID ORDER BY HGR_OG_ID) AS HTR_CNT FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O1 /*월조직내역*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /*월별창고내역*/ ON O1.BASE_YM = S1.APY_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = S1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.OG_ID = S1.OG_ID AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O2 /*월파트너내역*/ ON S1.APY_YM = O2.BASE_YM AND S1.OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND S1.OG_ID = O2.OG_ID AND S1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGPS_EGER_GD_RGST_IZ O3 /*엔지니어등급등록내역*/ ON O3.OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND O3.PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO AND #{perfYm} || '01' BETWEEN O3.APY_STRTDT AND O3.APY_ENDDT AND O3.APY_SEQN = (SELECT MAX(APY_SEQN) AS APY_SEQ FROM TB_OGPS_EGER_GD_RGST_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND OG_TP_CD = O3.OG_TP_CD AND PRTNR_NO = O3.PRTNR_NO AND #{perfYm} || '01' BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N') WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02') AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' /* 익월 bs를 조회시 월조직이 생성이 안되어 있기 때문에 이렇게 처리 */ AND O1.BASE_YM = LEAST(#{perfYm}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM'))
AND (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W06') THEN '71314' ELSE O1.OG_ID END) = #{dgr1LevlOgId} /*총괄단*/
AND (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID ELSE O1.OG_ID END) = #{dgr2LevlOgId} /*지역단*/
AND (CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'W03') THEN DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID ELSE O1.OG_ID END) = #{dgr3LevlOgId} /*지점*/
AND O2.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /* 매니저 파트너번호 */
ORDER BY O1.BASE_YM, O1.OG_CD ) , INQRY_LIST AS ( /* 대상 목록 */ SELECT V1.CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정번호*/ , V1.CNFM_PSIC_MNGT_DV_CD /*확정담당자관리구분코드*/ , V1.CNFM_PSIC_DV_CD /*확정담당자구분코드*/ , V1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD /*확정담당자파트너조직유형코드*/ , V1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO /*확정담당자파트너번호*/ , V1.CNTR_NO , V1.CNTR_SN , V1.RCGVP_KNM /*설치고객명*/ , (CASE WHEN V1.NP_PTRM IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NP_PTRM_CNT /*이월배정*/ , (CASE WHEN V1.NP_PTRM IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS THM_ASN_CNT /*당월배정*/ , (CASE WHEN V1.NP_PTRM IS NOT NULL AND V1.WK_EXCN_DT IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NP_PTRM_WRK_CNT /*이월배정완료*/ , (CASE WHEN V1.NP_PTRM IS NULL AND V1.WK_EXCN_DT IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 /*당월배정완료*/ END) AS THM_ASN_WRK_CNT , (CASE WHEN V1.NP_PTRM IS NOT NULL AND V1.NP_PTRM = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NP_PTRM_1 /*이월기간 1개월*/ , (CASE WHEN V1.NP_PTRM IS NOT NULL AND V1.NP_PTRM > '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NP_PTRM_2 /*이월기간 2개월 이상*/ FROM ( SELECT S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정번호*/ , S1.CNFM_PSIC_MNGT_DV_CD /*확정담당자관리구분코드*/ , S1.CNFM_PSIC_DV_CD /*확정담당자구분코드*/ , S1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD /*확정담당자파트너조직유형코드*/ , S1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO /*확정담당자파트너번호*/ , S1.CNTR_NO , S1.CNTR_SN , S1.WK_EXCN_DT , C5.RCGVP_KNM /*설치고객명*/ , P2.SAP_MAT_CD , S2.PDCT_PD_CD , S2.VST_DUEDT , P2.PD_NM , (CASE WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(#{perfYm}||'01', SUBSTR(S2.VST_DUEDT,1,6)||'01') = 0 THEN '' ELSE MONTHS_BETWEEN(#{perfYm}||'01', SUBSTR(S2.VST_DUEDT,1,6)||'01') || '' END) AS NP_PTRM /*미처리기간*/ , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY C4.DTL_CNTR_NO, C4.DTL_CNTR_SN ORDER BY C4.ADRPC_TP_CD DESC) AS ADRPC_TP_CD_RNK FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ S1 /*고객서비스BS배정내역, AC261TB*/ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ S2 /*고객서비스BS대상내역*/ ON S2.CST_SV_ASN_NO = S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL C1 /*계약WELLS상세*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C2 /*계약기본*/ ON C2.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C3 /*계약상세*/ ON C3.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C3.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND C3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL C4 /*계약주소관계*/ ON C4.DTL_CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C4.DTL_CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN C4.VL_STRT_DTM AND C4.VL_END_DTM AND C4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS C5 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON C5.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = C4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID AND C5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_PD_REL C6 /*계약상품관계*/ ON C6.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND C6.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND C6.PD_REL_TP_CD = '05' /* 01 복합-기준, 02 기준-기준, 03 기준-서비스, 04 서비스-서비스, 05 기준-제품, 06 대체품(Substitution), 07 상품-필터, 08 패키지(Package), 09 번들(Bundle), 10 프로모션상품-상품, 11 추가구매, 12 동시구매/기계약상품, 13 혼식불가, 14 AS부품, 15 대체모종, 16 멤버십기준상품, 17 구매 불가상품, 18 정기배송 제품명(BS), 19 동시구매선택상품, 20 동시구매선택번들상품, 21 패키지구성제품, 22 스마트체인지상품, 23 사은품, 24 BS투입제품, 25 구성품 */ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '000000' BETWEEN C6.VL_STRT_DTM AND C6.VL_END_DTM AND C6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P2 /*상품기본*/ ON P2.PD_CD = S2.PDCT_PD_CD AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN OG_PRTNR_WARE_INF O1 ON O1.OG_TP_CD = S1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = S1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S1.ASN_OJ_YM = #{perfYm}
/* AND S1.CNTR_NO = 'W20220029278' */ ) V1 WHERE 1=1 AND ADRPC_TP_CD_RNK = 1 ) , SV_CNTC_INF AS ( /* 배정번호별 최종 컨택 상태 */ SELECT V1.CST_SV_ASN_NO , V1.CNTC_DT , V1.CNTC_HH , V1.CNTC_CN , V1.ABSNC_RSON_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'ABSNC_RSON_CD', V1.ABSNC_RSON_CD, 'ko') AS ABSNC_RSON_NM /* 00 컨택완료, 11 판매자통화(부재), 12 안내지투입, 13 문자발송, 21 취소예정, 22 이사예정, 23 장기연체, 24 고객거부, 25 통화안됨, 26 장기여행, 27 익월방문, 28 제품분실, 31 ENG요청, 32 AS선처리 */ FROM ( SELECT S1.* , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO ORDER BY S1.CNTC_DT DESC, S1.CNTC_HH DESC) AS RNK FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_CNTC_IZ S1 /*배정고객컨택내역, KWAS.LC_VISIT_VS101TB 고객접촉이력정보*/ INNER JOIN INQRY_LIST I1 ON S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = I1.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO LIKE '2'||#{perfYm} || '%' ) V1 WHERE 1=1 AND RNK = 1 ) SELECT V2.L1_HGR_OG_CD AS DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD /*총괄단코드*/ , V2.L1_HGR_OG_NM AS DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM /*총괄단명*/ , V2.L2_HGR_OG_CD AS DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD /*지역단코드*/ , V2.L2_HGR_OG_NM AS DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM /*지역단명*/ , V2.NP_PTRM_TCNT /*이월배정*/ , V2.THM_ASN_TCNT /*당월배정*/ , V2.ASN_TCNT /*이월배정+당월배정*/ , V2.NCTT_TCNT /*미컨택*/ , V2.CTT_FSH_TCNT /*컨택완료*/ , ROUND(V2.CTT_FSH_TCNT/V2.ASN_TCNT,2) * 100 AS CTT_FSH_RAT /*컨택율*/ , V2.NP_PTRM_WRK_TCNT /*이월배정방문완료*/ , V2.THM_ASN_WRK_TCNT /*당월배정방문완료*/ , V2.ASN_FSH_TCNT /*이월배정방문완료 + 당월배정방문완료*/ , ROUND(V2.ASN_FSH_TCNT/V2.ASN_TCNT,2) * 100 AS ASN_FSH_RAT /*처리율*/ , V2.NP_PTRM_1_TCNT /*이월기간 1개월*/ , V2.NP_PTRM_2_TCNT /*이월기간 2개월 이상*/ FROM ( SELECT V1.L1_HGR_OG_CD /*총괄단코드*/ , V1.L1_HGR_OG_NM /*총괄단명*/ , V1.L2_HGR_OG_CD /*지역단코드*/ , V1.L2_HGR_OG_NM /*지역단명*/ , SUM(V1.NP_PTRM_CNT) AS NP_PTRM_TCNT /*이월배정*/ , SUM(V1.THM_ASN_CNT) AS THM_ASN_TCNT /*당월배정*/ , SUM(V1.ASN_TCNT) AS ASN_TCNT /*이월배정+당월배정*/ , SUM(V1.NCTT_CNT) AS NCTT_TCNT /*미컨택*/ , SUM(V1.CTT_FSH_CNT) AS CTT_FSH_TCNT /*컨택완료*/ , SUM(V1.NP_PTRM_WRK_CNT) AS NP_PTRM_WRK_TCNT /*이월배정방문완료*/ , SUM(V1.THM_ASN_WRK_CNT) AS THM_ASN_WRK_TCNT /*당월배정방문완료*/ , SUM(V1.ASN_FSH_TCNT) AS ASN_FSH_TCNT /*이월배정방문완료 + 당월배정방문완료*/ , SUM(V1.NP_PTRM_1) AS NP_PTRM_1_TCNT /*이월기간 1개월*/ , SUM(V1.NP_PTRM_2) AS NP_PTRM_2_TCNT /*이월기간 2개월 이상*/ FROM ( SELECT O1.L1_HGR_OG_CD /*지점ID*/ , O1.L1_HGR_OG_NM /*지점명*/ , O1.L2_HGR_OG_CD /*지점ID*/ , O1.L2_HGR_OG_NM /*지점명*/ , O1.L3_HGR_OG_CD /*지점ID*/ , O1.L3_HGR_OG_NM /*지점명*/ , I1.NP_PTRM_CNT /*이월배정*/ , I1.THM_ASN_CNT /*당월배정*/ , I1.NP_PTRM_CNT + I1.THM_ASN_CNT AS ASN_TCNT /*이월배정+당월배정*/ , I1.NP_PTRM_WRK_CNT /*이월배정방문완료*/ , I1.THM_ASN_WRK_CNT /*당월배정방문완료*/ , I1.NP_PTRM_WRK_CNT + I1.THM_ASN_WRK_CNT AS ASN_FSH_TCNT /*이월배정방문완료 + 당월배정방문완료*/ , I1.NP_PTRM_1 /*이월기간 1개월*/ , I1.NP_PTRM_2 /*이월기간 2개월 이상*/ , S1.ABSNC_RSON_CD , (CASE WHEN S1.ABSNC_RSON_CD IS NULL THEN 1 WHEN S1.ABSNC_RSON_CD NOT IN ('00', '21', '27') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NCTT_CNT /*미컨택건수*/ , (CASE WHEN S1.ABSNC_RSON_CD IS NOT NULL AND S1.ABSNC_RSON_CD IN ('00', '21', '27') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CTT_FSH_CNT /*컨택완료건수*/ FROM INQRY_LIST I1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SV_CNTC_INF S1 ON S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = I1.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN OG_PRTNR_WARE_INF O1 ON O1.OG_TP_CD = I1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND O1.PRTNR_NO = I1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO ORDER BY O1.L3_HGR_OG_CD /*지점ID*/ , O1.L3_HGR_OG_NM /*지점명*/ , O1.PRTNR_NO /*파트너사번*/ , I1.CNTR_NO , I1.CNTR_SN ) V1 WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY V1.L1_HGR_OG_CD , V1.L1_HGR_OG_NM , V1.L2_HGR_OG_CD , V1.L2_HGR_OG_NM ) V2 WHERE 1=1
